评论概述: Falling for fall fashion and leaving my summer threads behind
评论详情: Get ready to slay this fall with Trendy Queen’s Women’s Boat Neck Tops. These tops are made from the softest, stretchiest material that feels like a dream against your skin. They fit true to size, giving you that perfect, flattering silhouette. The oversized boat neckline is super cute and adds a touch of effortless chic to any outfit. Whether you’re pairing it with jeans for a casual day out or dressing it up with a skirt for a night on the town, this top is your new go-to. Embrace the cozy vibes and stylish flair of Trendy Queen and make a statement this season.

I wear this shirt more frequently than I thought I would.  It is a very classy style and can be dressed up or down depending on the event.  Material is thicker and great for the colder seasons.  Fits like a dream (I got a size medium, I am 5'4" and 135lbs).  I also have generally broader shoulders than most girls my age but this still fits really well - the boat neck is flattering on the broader shoulders.
